name: Two Flew Over ETC Nursing Home
name_original: Two Flew Over ETC Nursing Home
description:
A 2v2 racing game where each team plays as grannies and grandpas that try to escape their nursing home on a wheelchair built for two. Guests need to roll the wheelchair wheels to race and avoid nurses and barriers. Only the leading team can escape.

Check here for Intro Trailer

This is a web version, only supports a keyboard instead of the real wheel.

P1 (Left Wheelchair - Left Role):

Left Wheel Forward:  Q

Left Wheel Backward: A

P2  (Left Wheelchair - Right Role):

Right Wheel Forward: T

Right Wheel Backward: G

P3: (Right Wheelchair - Left Role)

Left Wheel Forward:  Arrow Up

Left Wheel Backward: Arrow Down

P4: (Right Wheelchair - Right Role)

Right Wheel Forward: Keypad 3

Right Wheel Backward: Keypad period ( . )
